CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Distemper_Vaccine__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Hepatitis_Vaccine__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Parainfluenza_Vaccine__c), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Parvovirus_Vaccine__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Physical_Exam__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Rabies_Vaccine__c ) ), 'Good', 'Expired' & IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif", '*') )
CustomField.label: Vaccination Expiry Date Status
